description: Number of ways of placing n nonattacking toroidal queens on an n X n chessboard.
comments: The sequence is given to n=23 in the reference. Further terms were calculated by the submitter, Dec 17 1999 and Jan 11 2001.a(n) is divisible by n.
references: M. R. Engelhardt, A group-based search for solutions of the n-queens problem, Discr. Math., 307 (2007), 2535-2551.
I. Rivin, I. Vardi and P. Zimmermann, The n-queens problem, Amer. Math. Monthly, 101 (1994), 629-639
crossrefs: See A007705, which is the main entry for this sequence.
author: _Matthias Engelhardt_, Dec 17 1999
extensions: Term a(31) added from A007705 by _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Aug 25 2012
